regularEvents.title: COVID-19
regularEvents.descriptive:
Regularly scheduled events are cancelled until further notice.

Visit the
[Diocese of Peterborough](https://www.peterboroughdiocese.org/en/index.aspx)
website for the latest updates.

regularEvents.title: Catholic Video Content
regularEvents.descriptive:
The
[Diocese of Peterborough channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Cd0rFPwUxMtMRhS_UtCxg/videos)
on YouTube features the weekly Sunday Mass celebrated by
Bishop Daniel Miehm, as well as other inspirational content from around
the Diocese.


The
[Cogeco YourTV channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwtRHLhr6gUGaVt_5gG7Ynw/videos)
on YouTube also features the weekly Sunday Mass, along with
other Peterborough area content.

specialEvents.title: Adoration and Benediction
specialEvents.descriptive:
Please join us for our first faith event since the beginning of the
COVID-19 lockdowns!


The celebration will take place outdoors, in the parking lot
across Hunter St from The Cathedral.
Volunteers will be on-hand to assist with parking.
Please arrive early.

specialEvents.title: Drive-Thru Confession
specialEvents.descriptive:
Come Saturday afternoon to participate in the
Holy Sacrament of Reconciliation, from the safety and
comfort of your vehicle.


Three priests will be available. Parishioners are asked to follow
the signs and remain in their vehicles.

**Take a spin, bring your sin!**

specialEvents.title: Sunday Mass
specialEvents.subtitle: The Most Holy Trinity
specialEvents.descriptive:
Celebrated at The Cathedral by Bishop Daniel Miehm,
this very special Mass
airs on **Channel 10 and 700** on Cogeco Cable and
will be available on YouTube.

[View this Mass on YouTube...](https://youtu.be/pCgrkplzwYs)

bulletins.title: Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity
